de.systemagmbh.common.table
Interface ISysTableAdapterForResultSet

All Superinterfaces:
ISysTableModel
All Known Implementing Classes:
CSysTableAdapterForOldResultSet
public interface ISysTableAdapterForResultSet
extends ISysTableModel

A table that implements this interface can not contain different types of Objects in one column. The different columns can contain different types.

Version:
$Revision: 1.4 $
Author:
Udo Friedrich

Method Summary
 void clear()
          To be able to reuse a table adapter it should be able to be cleared.

          Initialise the Adapter with a java.sql.ResultSet.
